main event: A bright meteor was observed in Nebraska, Missouri on October 31, 1954, with a large, colorful trail lasting several seconds.
interesting points: The meteor had a bright green color and left a trail displaying all colors of the rainbow,The observation was reported by a civilian source,Indications suggest it was an astronomical event rather than a man-made object,There was a significant amount of interest among local residents regarding the sighting,The meteor faded out after creating a large tail across the sky.
witness description: Observers included unidentified airline pilots and civilian witnesses.
